levels.title: Rain of Life
levels.mission: Draw vertical lines falling from the cloud.
levels.success_feedback: The rain falls and gives life!
levels.failure_feedback: Try to make the lines straighter, like real rain.
levels.style_prompt_template: A close-up 3D render of a {object} made of {style}, isolated on white background. The {object} is the main subject. High fidelity, 8k.

levels.title: Bubble Shield
levels.mission: Enclose the character in a circle.
levels.success_feedback: Shield activated! Nothing can get in.
levels.failure_feedback: Watch out! There is a gap in the shield.
levels.style_prompt_template: A giant 3D soap bubble protecting a {object}, iridescent shader, transparent glossy, isolated. The bubble is the focus.

levels.title: Cross the Abyss
levels.mission: Connect both sides with a bridge.
levels.validation_criteria: Horizontal line connecting A and B.
levels.success_feedback: Bridge built! We can cross now.
levels.failure_feedback: The bridge doesn't reach the other side or it's broken.
levels.style_prompt_template: A sturdy {style} bridge spanning a gap, isometric view, game asset style, isolated on white background. High texture detail.

levels.title: Lightning Mountain
levels.failure_feedback: We need more peaks and sharp angles.
levels.style_prompt_template: electric lightning bolt, yellow energy glowing, crackling plasma, style: {style}

levels.title: Acrobatic Flight
levels.mission: Do a loop-the-loop in the air.
levels.failure_feedback: Try to make the line cross itself to form a loop.
levels.style_prompt_template: wind trail, white smoke stream, speed lines, style: {style}

levels.title: Creative Mode
levels.validation_criteria: FIRST IDENTIFY THE DRAWN OBJECT. If it is a cat, say it is a cat.
levels.success_feedback: I recognized your drawing! It's a {object}.
levels.failure_feedback: I can't quite distinguish the drawing, try to press harder with the pencil or close the shapes.
levels.style_prompt_template: A high-quality 3D render of a {object} made of {style}, centered, isolated on plain background. The {object} is based on a child's drawing but transformed into a professional asset. No landscapes, just the {object}.
